interactable.Name: Cave
interactable.DiscoveredString: You spot a dark, dank cave.

Interaction.InteractionValue: You decide to peek into the cave mouth.
You turn tail and run the other direction.

interactable.Name: Shack
interactable.DiscoveredString: You find a shack, a sense of dread washes over you.

Interaction.InteractionValue: Ignoring your doubts you hesitantly peer through the door.
You leave the sinister shack alone. It is probably for the best.

interactable.Name: Forest
interactable.DiscoveredString: You find a large forest, teaming with life.

Interaction.InteractionValue: You set off on the path leading into the heart of the forest
You decide you have other things to do than frolic in a forest.
